entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH, Trois-Rivières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:18 a.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Trois-Rivières Airport 2:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.1°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 52 %
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: S 24 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm except 5 cm over northern sections. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
